00016 #ifndef IMAGEWIDGET_H_
00017 #define IMAGEWIDGET_H_
00018 
00019 #include <QWidget>
00020 #include <QPixmap>
00021 #include <QMenu>
00022 #include <QContextMenuEvent>
00023 #include "ui_imagewidget.h"
00024 
00025 class ImageWidget : public QWidget, Ui::ImageWidget
00026 {
00027   private:
00028     QMenu* m_menu;
00029          QSize m_size;
00030          bool m_hasImg;
00031 
00032   public:
00033     ImageWidget(QWidget* parent=0) : QWidget(parent)
00034     {
00035       setupUi(this);
00036       m_menu = NULL;
00037                 m_hasImg = false;
00038     }
00039 
00040     void setPixmap(const QPixmap pix)
00041     {
00042                 m_hasImg = true;
00043                 m_size = pix.size();
00044       imageLabel->setPixmap(pix);
00045                 updateImageSize();
00046     }
00047 
00048     void setContextMenu(QMenu* menu)
00049     {
00050       m_menu = menu;
00051     }
00052 
00053     void contextMenuEvent(QContextMenuEvent *event)
00054     {
00055       if(m_menu)
00056         m_menu->exec(event->globalPos());
00057     }
00058 
00059          void updateImageSize()
00060          {
00061                 if(!m_hasImg)
00062                   return;
00063 
00064                 int width=0, height=0;
00065                 double ratio = m_size.width() / (double)m_size.height();
00066                 double ratioW = this->width() / (double)this->height();
00067 
00068                 if((ratio>1 && ratio>ratioW) || (ratio<1 && ratio>ratioW))
00069                 {
00070                   width = this->width();
00071                   height = (int)(width / ratio);
00072                 }
00073                 else
00074                 {
00075                   height = this->height();
00076                   width = (int)(height * ratio);
00077                 }
00078 
00079                 imageLabel->setMaximumWidth(width);
00080                 imageLabel->setMaximumHeight(height);
00081                 imageLabel->setMinimumWidth(width);
00082                 imageLabel->setMinimumHeight(height);
00083 
00084                 int margin = (this->width()-width)/2;
00085                 verticalLayout->setContentsMargins(margin, 0, 0, 0);
00086          }
00087 
00088          void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* event)
00089          {
00090                 Q_UNUSED(event);
00091                 updateImageSize();
00092          }
00093 };
00094 
00095 #endif
